text: The 1951 Santa Clara Broncos football team was an American football team that represented Santa Clara University during the 1951 college football season. In their second season under head coach Richard F. Gallagher, the Broncos compiled a 3–5–1 record and were outscored by opponents by a combined total of 234 to 140. ==Schedule== ==References== Santa Clara Category:Santa Clara Broncos football seasons Santa Clara Broncos football
title: 1951 Santa Clara Broncos football team
